name: welcome
author: Subestro
description: Sends a welcome message to new members who join the server.
install_msg: The welcome cog has been installed successfully. Use the **`setchannel`** and **`unsetchannel`** commands to set or unset the channel for the welcome message.

commands.name: setchannel
commands.description: Sets the channel where the bot will send the welcome message.

commands.name: unsetchannel
commands.description: Unsets the channel where the bot will send the welcome message.
